title: The $90 Billion Squeeze: What the Triad's Budget Really Means for Your Capture Strategy
description: Two massive funding streams converge at the exact moment the Pentagon is tearing up its acquisition rulebook. The $40.5 billion DHP budget sits alongside a brand-new $50 billion Rural Health Transformation Program.

title: The MHS Triad Part 2: The Capability Stack
description: H2F, telehealth landscape, what's missing, and what it all means for contractors, beneficiaries, and the warfighter. Plus predictions for 2026-2028.

title: The MHS Triad Part 1: Meet the Leaders Reshaping Military Medicine
description: Keith Bass, Emil Michael, and Admiral Darin Via are about to transform how we think about military medicine. Here's who they are and what they're inheriting.

title: Department of War: What the Name Change Really Means
description: The Pentagon's shift from 'Defense' to 'War' isn't just optics. It's doctrine. Here's what it means for the MHS and federal health IT.

title: The Audit Mandate: Why Everything Has to Work Now
description: DoD must achieve a clean audit opinion by December 31, 2028. That's not a goalâ€”it's a congressional mandate. Here's why it matters for DHA.

title: The Oura Disaster: Lessons from a $96M Contract Collapse
description: The sole-source wearables contract didn't die because WHOOP filed a protest. It died because DHA couldn't audit the data.

title: Human Performance Optimization: The Doctrine Behind the Tech
description: Admiral Via's 'Human Weapon System' concept is reshaping how the MHS thinks about warfighter health. What it means for your solution.

title: GenAI.mil: The Pentagon's AI Gambit
description: Emil Michael just put Google's Gemini on every DoD desktop. 3 million users, every classification level. Here's what it means for military medicine.
